name: Hell Gene
description:
HELL GENE Reject your birthright. Escape destiny. Create chaos.

Play as the descendant of the Demon King as you reject your heritage, take up arms, and escape through the ever-changing rooms of Hell. The only way to escape: Defeat the Demon King. 

Along the way, you'll pick up temporary weapons to further annihilate your enemies, and gain the ability to permanently increase your own strength... at the cost of making your escape more chaotic.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Melee Attack

Right Click - Ranged Attack

Left Shift - Dash

Created for the Brackeys Community Jam 2021 2
